title: my freind cant get in on his account
body: when he locked on his account, couldt he lock in bcs of the username/password and he made a troll email. It happend for me b4 and i used my rp card code to get it back. If u can help, then pls do it. He has the rp cards, so he can write the code.

replies.body: Let your friend know that he'll need to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as he can! Those account agents will be able to verify him as the account creator and get him back on the Rift asap!
